alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Simpson and eastern Copiah Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockport, or 9 miles east of Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Union around 420 PM CDT. Hopewell around 425 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
